result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a client for interacting with a relay service and defining data structures for handling relay operations and token transactions.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client functionality and data models related to relay services.

internal/infras/relay/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with a relay service, providing methods to fetch chains, tokens, quotes, and fee balances.

internal/infras/relay/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling relay operations and token transactions.
